Experience Demand Planning Analyst JPMORGAN CHASE CO Columbus OH May 2014 to Present Ensure that the Business Banking annual technology book of work is welldefined prioritized budgeted and implemented to meet the goals and objectives of the Firm and program sponsors Use project management and business analysis skills in an Agile environment to plan technology demand and follow those projects to status calls tracking issues and mitigating risks Manage a backlog of 80 small technology enhancement requests ensuring that each request flows smoothly through prioritization estimation scheduling pain points Led a team which focused on reporting and automation to provide the Enhanced Root Cause Analysis Group with information to discuss issues and recommend solutions to Home Lending partners Managed the groups production and quality statistics Improved quality consistency and reliability by automating manual tasks identifying opportunities to eliminate or reduce manual intervention and potential user errors Designed and implemented a quality control process for action items to improve response rate and response quality from business partners Gather and analyze data to create monthly quarterly yearly reports trends themes emerging issues etc Present root cause analysis findings to the Home Lending lines of business and other partners Risk Controls Compliance etc RCSA Senior track controls testing and house testing results Gathered and analyzed data to create production reporting executive presentation decks and other adhoc reporting Built strong relationships with process and data owners to identify gaps and implement solutions to improve processes and strengthen controls Project Manager JPMORGAN CHASE CO Columbus OH June 2012 to June 2013 Provided leadership to inbound and outbound mortgage loan transfers within the Loan Transfers group that were essential to the strategic objective to improve the strength and profitability of Home Lending and the Firm Engaged internal departments and drove the timely completion of required tasks as well as ensured that both parties received the complete and accurate data needed for a successful transfer Worked within a predetermined timeline engaged stakeholder planned tasks and deliverables built teams from crossfunctional departments presented project status to executives and steering committees managed deliverables checklist with timeline Managed transfer of 19000 loans worth 3 billion to a subservicing vendor Planned and led all phases of the transfer working with over 20 internal groups Designed
